title: Lodging Reservation
description: Collects all details specific to a lodging reservation.

xdm:agentID.title: Agent ID
xdm:agentID.description: Agent ID associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:averageDailyPrice.title: Average Daily Price
xdm:averageDailyPrice.description: Average daily price of the hotel room.

xdm:basePrice.title: Base Price
xdm:basePrice.description: Base price before any discounts are added.

xdm:bookingID.title: Booking ID
xdm:bookingID.description: Booking ID associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:checkInDate.title: Check-In Date
xdm:checkInDate.description: The check-in date of the for the room reservation.

xdm:checkOutDate.title: Check-Out Date
xdm:checkOutDate.description: The check-out date of the for the room reservation.

xdm:couponCode.title: Coupon Code
xdm:couponCode.description: Coupon code associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:discountPercent.title: Discount Percent
xdm:discountPercent.description: Discount percentage associated with the booking.

xdm:freeCancelation.title: Free Cancelation
xdm:freeCancelation.description: Yes/no if the room has a free cancellation.

xdm:guestID.title: Guest ID
xdm:guestID.description: Guest ID associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

xdm:numberOfRooms.title: Number of Rooms
xdm:numberOfRooms.description: Captures the number of rooms associated with the reservation.

xdm:propertyID.title: Property ID
xdm:propertyID.description: Identifier of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Name of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

xdm:ratePlan.title: Rate Plan
xdm:ratePlan.description: The rate deal on which the room was sold.

xdm:refundable.title: Refundable
xdm:refundable.description: Yes/no if the room is refundable.

xdm:roomAccessibilityType.title: Room Accessibility Type
xdm:roomAccessibilityType.description: Type of accessible room, such as mobility, hearing, or other.

xdm:roomCapacity.title: Room Capacity
xdm:roomCapacity.description: Number of people the hotel room holds.

xdm:roomType.title: Room Type
xdm:roomType.description: Captures the type of room being reserved.

xdm:smoking.title: Smoking
xdm:smoking.description: Yes/no if the room allows smoking.
